query.statement: SELECT EXIST_YN1, EXIST_YN2, EXIST_YN3, EXIST_YN4 FROM ( SELECT DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAS_TICKET_MST WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND ITEM_CODE = #ITEM_CODE# AND TRANS_TYPE||TRANS_GUBUN NOT IN ('III', 'OOO', 'WWW')), 0, 'N','Y') EXIST_YN1, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAS_TICKET_MST WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND ITEM_CODE = #ITEM_CODE# AND TRANS_TYPE||TRANS_GUBUN = 'III'), 1, 'N','Y') EXIST_YN2, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAS_TICKET_MST WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND ITEM_CODE = #ITEM_CODE# AND AUTO_GUBUN = 'Y'), 0, 'N','Y') EXIST_YN3, DECODE(SIGN(NVL(#OO_QTY_SUM#, 0) - (SELECT SUM(QTY) FROM MAS_TICKET_MST WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND ITEM_CODE = #ITEM_CODE# AND TRANS_TYPE||TRANS_GUBUN = 'WWW')), -1, 'Y','N') EXIST_YN4 FROM DUAL )
